summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1307, for the improvement of 5th Avenue North from Aloha Street to Prospect Street, and Prospect Street from 5th Avenue North to 7th Avenue North, by constructing concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 14749 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
